cells.data:
* Java Beans: zero-argument constructor + no public fields + persistent values should be accessed through get and set methods
* API:
  * useBean: <jsp:useBean id="beanName" class="package.Class"/>
  * setProperty: <jsp:setProperty name="beanName" property="proprtyName" value="propertyValue"/>
  * getProperty: <jsp:getProperty name="beanName" property="propertyName"/>
